label: Personnel & Qualifications
quote: The Journeyman HCATS labor category has 3 to 10 years of experience and a Bachelor of Arts (BA)/Bachelor of Science (BS) or MA/MS degree.
short_label: Senior HR Specialist: Experience & Degree

label: Personnel & Qualifications
quote: The Senior Human Resource Specialist will possess a comprehensive range of knowledge and experience in the area of Federal retirement and benefits.
short_label: Senior HR Specialist: Federal Retirement/Benefits Knowledge

label: Technical Approach & Capability
quote: The individual(s) will be experienced and possess significant knowledge in providing retirement and benefits counseling, preparing annuity estimates, reviewing, completing and processing retirement applications.
short_label: Senior HR Specialist: Retirement Counseling & Processing

label: Technical Approach & Capability
quote: Provide support to resolve complex retirement and benefits issues.
short_label: Senior HR Specialist: Complex Retirement Issue Support

label: Technical Approach & Capability
quote: The individual(s) will have the knowledge to research and respond to general inquiries regarding retirement and benefits.
short_label: Senior HR Specialist: Retirement Inquiry Response

label: Management & Staffing
quote: The individual will have experience collaborating with other Federal agencies.
short_label: Senior HR Specialist: Federal Agency Collaboration

label: Management & Staffing
quote: The individual(s) will be experienced in creating and executing plans for actions with minimal supervision.
short_label: Senior HR Specialist: Plan Execution with Minimal Supervision

label: Technical Approach & Capability
quote: The individual(s) will possess proven administrative skills relevant to HR operations.
short_label: Senior HR Specialist: Administrative Skills

label: Customer Service & Communications
quote: The individual(s) will possess strong oral and written communication capabilities.
short_label: Senior HR Specialist: Communication Skills

label: Personnel & Qualifications
quote: The Junior HCATS labor category has up to 3 years’ experience and a BA/BS degree.
short_label: Junior HR Specialist: Experience & Degree

label: Management & Staffing
quote: A Junior HCATS labor category is responsible for assisting more senior positions and/or performing functional duties under the oversight of more senior positions.
short_label: Junior HR Specialist: Duties & Oversight

label: Personnel & Qualifications
quote: The Junior Human Resource Specialist will possess a comprehensive range of knowledge and experience in Federal retirement and benefits.
short_label: Junior HR Specialist: Federal Retirement/Benefits Knowledge

label: Technical Approach & Capability
quote: The individual(s) will be experienced and possess significant knowledge reviewing and processing health benefits requests and life insurance requests.
short_label: Junior HR Specialist: Health/Life Insurance Processing

label: Technical Approach & Capability
quote: The individual(s) will have knowledge of Federal Human Resources programs for functional areas assigned and experience with file organization and maintenance procedures.
short_label: Junior HR Specialist: Federal HR Programs Knowledge

label: Management & Staffing
quote: The Junior HR Specialist also will be experienced in completing other long- and short-term projects with minimal supervision.
short_label: Junior HR Specialist: Project Completion

label: Technical Approach & Capability
quote: The individual(s) will possess proven administrative skills relevant to HR operations.
short_label: Junior HR Specialist: Administrative Skills

label: Customer Service & Communications
quote: The individual(s) must possess strong oral and written communication capabilities.
short_label: Junior HR Specialist: Communication Skills

label: Personnel & Qualifications
quote: The Junior HCATS labor category has up to 3 years’ experience and a BA/BS degree.
short_label: Junior Admin Clerk: Experience & Degree

label: Personnel & Qualifications
quote: The Junior Administrative/Office Automation Clerk contractor will possess 1 to 5 years of administrative experience.
short_label: Junior Admin Clerk: Administrative Experience

label: Technical Approach & Capability
quote: The individual(s) will provide administrative support to the RABAS Branch.
short_label: Junior Admin Clerk: Administrative Support

label: Technical Approach & Capability
quote: The individual(s) will perform work by creating and manipulating data for various reports.
short_label: Junior Admin Clerk: Data & Report Creation

label: Technology
quote: The individual(s) will have knowledge and experience with personal computers and office software to perform their duties.
short_label: Junior Admin Clerk: Office Software Knowledge

label: Technology
quote: The individual(s) will obtain data and generate reports for a variety of automated tracking systems.
short_label: Junior Admin Clerk: Automated Tracking Systems

label: Customer Service & Communications
quote: Other duties include answering the telephone and processing incoming and outgoing mail in support of the HR Mission.
short_label: Junior Admin Clerk: Telephone & Mail Processing

label: Customer Service & Communications
quote: The individual(s) must possess strong oral and written communication capabilities.
short_label: Junior Admin Clerk: Communication Skills
